entry.title: Clorox Healthcare® - Hydrogen Peroxide Cleaning/Disinfectant Wipes (185ct Refill)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CLOROX
Type: Disinfectant Wipes
Price: 44.39

Clorox Healthcare® Hydrogen Peroxide Cleaner Disinfectant Wipes are ready-to-use and have disinfecting times as short as 30 seconds for 1 step cleaning & disinfecting. Clorox Healthcare® Hydrogen Peroxide Cleaner Disinfectant Wipes are ready-to-use and have disinfecting times as short as 30 seconds for 1 step cleaning & disinfecting. These wipes are Health Canada registered to kill the germs that are of greatest concern to public health. When you need to disinfect those high–touch “hot spots” (desktops, handles, faucets, water fountains, toys, etc.) — you can’t afford to use products that require long contact times to kill germs. Helping to better disinfect the school environment - from classrooms to gyms to nurse’s offices — and protect students and staff from the spread of germs.

  • Kills 38 pathogens in 60 seconds or less
  • Pre-moistened, durable, ready-to-use wipes
  • Does not leave a solid residue
Qty/container 185

entry.title: Clorox® Healthcare® - Disinfecting Wipes (110ct Refill)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CLOROX
Type: Disinfectant Wipe
Price: 36.28

 Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting are great for cleaning and fighting bacteria & virus throughout your home. These disinfecting wipes kill 99.9% of bacteria, including cold and flu, Staph, Strep, E.coli, Salmonella & Listeria. Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting are easy to use and work on a variety of hard, nonporous surfaces, including mirrors and glass. The powerful cleaning technology dissolves kitchen grease and fights soap scum. For convenient cleaning and disinfecting, keep this canister in your kitchen or bathroom or at your desk at work. Use these wipes anywhere messes or dirt may build up. Clean and disinfect anytime with the convenience of Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting.

  • Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
  • Kills cold and flu viruses, Staph, Strep, E.coli, Salmonella & Listeria
  • Clear-drying formula works on a variety of surfaces
  • Powerful cleaning technology fights kitchen grease and soap scum
Wipes/Canister 110
Length
6-3/4"
Width 9"
Manufacture Code
01308

Hanyclean Hand Sanitizing Wipes effectively kill 99.99% of most common germs that may cause illness. entry.title: Virox 5 - RTU Disinfectant Wipes (160/ct)
entry.summary:
Vendor: DIVERSEY
Type: Disinfectant Wipes
Price: 23.05

A one-step disinfectant cleaner based on proprietary hydrogen peroxide (AHP®) technology to deliver fast and effective cleaning performance. Product is both virucidal and bactericidal. Disinfection requires a five-minute contact time. Also provides broad spectrum sanitizing on hard surfaces in 30 seconds. Concentrate delivers economical performance. Meets bloodborne pathogen standards for decontaminating blood and body fluids. Colorless and odorless.

  • Proven effectiveness against the Polio virus, Sabin strain type 1 (ATCC VR 192) allows for a General Virucide claim against most enveloped and non-enveloped viruses.
  • Kills Norovirus, MRSA and VRE in 5 minute
  • Provides broad spectrum sanitizing on hard surfaces in 30 seconds
  • Environmentally-responsible; no VOC's, no added fragrance, no NPE's. The active ingredient breaks down to water and oxygen after use
Container Type  Can
Container Quantity 160 wipes/container
